column6: The 4th chapter of the Black Vortex! With some of their members captured by the villainous Mr. Knife, the team must decipher the secrets of the Black Vortex. And quickly! But with the galaxy in chaos, they don't have too many options open to them. Maybe there's an old war-buddy Peter can call to help them out?
column8: | artist:Mahmud Asrar | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Andrea Sorrentino
